verses.roman:
cabbiśa vatsara-śeṣa yei māgha-māsa
tāra śukla-pakṣe prabhu karilā sannyāsa

synonyms: cabbiśa—twenty-fourth; vatsara—of the year; śeṣa—at the end; yei—that; māgha-māsa—the month of Māgha (January and February); tāra—of that; śukla-pakṣe—in the waxing period of the moon; prabhu—the Lord; karilā—accepted; sannyāsa—the sannyāsa order of life.
translation: At the end of His twenty-fourth year, in the month of Māgha, Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu accepted the sannyāsa order during the waxing period of the moon.
